EmailTemplate.description: TEAM-36711LH Issue Resolution - sent for completed interaction master cases for Auto clients
EmailTemplate.name: Lighthouse Issue Resolution Survey - LH Auto
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us What You Think In 2 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
At Lighthouse, we are passionate about your success and are committed to continually improving the service we provide you.
If you have a moment, we’d be grateful if you could answer a few questions about your experience with our Lighthouse Support Team, so that we can continue to improve the Lighthouse 360 experience for you and all of the businesses we support.
Click the link below to take the survey about your recent request. It should only take a couple minutes and the link will expire in one week.
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=780cm61w3oiy&q1={!Account.Id}&q2={!Case.Id}&q3={!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Thank you, Lighthouse Support
©{!User.Today_s_Year__c} Henry Schein One. All Rights Reserved. [1220 South 630 East Suite 100 | American Fork, Utah 84003|webextlink://1220 South 630 East Suite 100 | American Fork, Utah 84003] Lighthouse 360 is a Henry Schein One brand.
